article_title: Gaza nurse says whole family, including quadruplets, killed in air strike
sentence: A  nurse  in  Gaza  has  told  the  BBC  his  wife  and  six  children  -  including  a  group  of  quadruplets  -  were  killed  in  an  attack  in  the  central  Gaza  strip.

sentence: Killed  in  the  strike  were  Mr  El  Attar's  wife  -  Hala  Khattab,  a  teacher  -  and  their  six  children  -  a  15-year-old  boy,  a  one-year-old  girl,  and  their  four  10-year-old  quadruplets.
